column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Two groups of tuk tuk drivers fought a bloody battle that injured two men. The incident took place at 7:30 pm on December 3
column4: 2019 at Aeon 2 in Phnom Penh Thmey
column5: Khan Sen Sok.------According to the sources at the scene
column6: two men drove two Indian tuk tuks  to  a parking spot where other three-wheelers were already waiting.------An argument broke out over parking rights/fees
column7: and a mob of between 20-30 people scuffled
column8: causing injuries. Most of the group fled before police arrived.------ 3 suspects and their vehicles were taken to the Sen Sok district police for questioning and legal action. The victims  went to hospital for treatment. ------KBN
